page.title: 14CONSUMER SURVEY
page.content: A SURVEY OF ABOUT 1400 HOMES WAS DONE BY SCHOOL PUPILS WHO DELIVERED QUESTIONNAIRES TO HOMES IN THE AREA. ABOUT 450 WERE RETURNED AND THEIR RESULTS WERE ANALYSED. (SEE LAST PAGE OF{CONSUMER SURVEY}FOR HOW SURVEY WAS DONE) {...................................... { % SAMPLE {FAMILY}1 17.7 {SURVEY POPULATION { SIZE} 2 30.9 705 PERSONS 3 17.3 250 VOTERS(18+) 4 19.75 47.57% MALE 5 4.9 52.43% FEMALE 6 5.75 OVER 6 1.2 {...................................... {AGE GROUPS} 0-12 YRS 11.0 13-19 YRS 14.4 PENSIONERS 16.0(WOMEN 60+,MEN 65+ OTHER ADULTS 58.6
